section.title: LayoutSwitcher
section.para: The layout switcher provides the functionnality to modules to have their own set of layouts, contained in a specific directory, apart from the application library's layouts.

LayoutSwitcher checks the configuration for the following keys:
moduleName.resources.layout.layout = layoutName
moduleName.resources.layout.layoutPath = layoutPath [optionnal]
where moduleName is the same module name dispatched with the request
where layoutName is the name of the layout script (e.g default)
where layoutPath is the path to the layout directory, if none is provided it assumes APPLICATION_PATH/moduleName/views/layouts
By default, Majisti synergizes this feature with the Layout resource. See more details here.
